Einstein.effect_1: When QTE, decrease enemy's element resist by 15% in 5s. CD:15s
Einstein.effect_2: Taking damage opens an elemental ring, increasing your elemental resistance by 5% + 1% of your current element resist for 5s and element damage by 15%. CD : 8s

Condelina.effect_2: Basic attacks has a 25% chance to trigger Berserk mode. During Berserk mode, Increase basic attack damage by 15% and critical chance by 5%. Lasts for 5s. CD: 8s

Shakespeare.effect_1: Increase all damage by 3% and fire damage by 7%
Shakespeare.effect_2: Each attack has a 25% chance to inflict Burn to the enemy for 5s. Attacking Burned enemies has a 20% chance to trigger an explosion, dealing 100% fire damage. Burned enemies have -10% fire resist and take 10% fire damage every second. Burn can stack up to 3 times. Burn duration resets after each stack.

Heisen.effect_1: Increase all damage by 3% and lightning damage by 7%
Heisen.effect_2: Each attack has a 25% chance of triggering a 3.5m radius lightning explosion. The explosion deals 100% damage and inflict Electrify for 5 seconds to enemies caught in it. Electrify decreases enemy's lightning resistance by 8%. Attacking Electrified enemies have a 20% chance of triggering Lightning Chain that causes 250% to all enemies inflicted with Electrify.

Darwin.effect_1: Increase all damage by 3% for every orb consumed, lasts for 4s. 5 stacks max, with each stack resetting the buff's duration
Darwin.effect_2: When consuming an orb, the orb's corresponding color is stored. When 3 colors are collected, release a 12m radius shockwave beneath the character that deals 600% physical damage

Hannah.effect_2: Every 30s, the next 3 orb skill will trigger slowmo. Character will gain 1 random orb.

Adolf.effect_1: Gain 20% more energy when consuming an orb. Ultimate takes 20% less energy to activate
Adolf.effect_2: Gain a buff that increases all damage by 15% for 10 seconds, decreases damage taken by 20%, and super armor after ultimate is unleashed.

Leonardo Da Vinci.effect_1: After QTE, the player-controlled character's attack and defense will be increased by 10% and 20%, respectively, for 5 seconds
Leonardo Da Vinci.effect_2: After activating QTE through a 3 orb consumption, trigger another character's QTE. CD: 8s. When all characters are on the field at once, increase attack by 20%

Kinda.effect_1: QTE/3 orb skills will decrease the target's physical defense by 30%. CD: 10s
Kinda.effect_2: When damaged, gain a shield equal to 20% of your defense and increase character's physical attack by 15% for 5s. CD: 8s

Ferric.effect_1: Increase healing effectiveness by 10%. Heals increase the target's physical damage and defense by 10% for 5 seconds. CD: 8s
Ferric.effect_2: Everytime you cast a healing skill, drone receives one charge. When the drone is fully charged, the next heal will summon a healing drone. The drone will automatically follow the lowest health character on the field healing 2% of the character's maximum health every second in a 5m radius. The area will also increase physical damage by 15% for 5s. One drone can be deployed every 12s

Guinea.effect_1: Increase healing effectiveness by 10%. Heals increases target's elemental damage and resistance by 10% for 5s
Guinea.effect_2: Everytime you cast a heal skill, drone receives one charge. When the drone is fully charged, the next heal will summon an elemental drone. The drone will automatically follow the lowest health character on the field healing 2% of the character's maximum health every second in a 5m radius. The area will also increase elemental damage by 15% for 5s. One drone can be deployed every 12s

Frederich.effect_1: Dodging increases movement speed by 15% and total damage by 5%, stackable up to 3 times
Frederich.effect_2: Dodging decreases the attacker's speed by 20% and receives more damage by 15%, lasts for 4s. CD: 8s

Patton.effect_1: Increase critical chance and physical damage by 5%
Patton.effect_2: For every non-critical attack dealt, the next physical attack's critical chance by 2%, stackable up to 20%. Critical chance is reset once a critical attack has landed. Physical damage is increased by 5% whenever you land a critical strike for 3s, stackable up to 3 times
